reviews.review_msg: she talks so much. goes off in her own world kinda
- FRIENDLIEST personality ever!!! so encouraging and motivating , i would def take more classes with him! so adorable !
Lots of reading but not overly dense.
I didn't like the class because there is no chance to write about your opinion in the exam. You must write what he said in the lecture & the textbook word by word. Very hard marker
It's writen as 101(100 level) but he and his TA will mark your work as 400 level class. I'm a third year student took this class and it's the most hard marker class I ever take
One thing, take his class if you want to work too much and get a poor mark

I was very interested in Poli Sci until this course. The communication online is terrible and everyone i've spoken to has received similar marks and feedback with careless marking unclear assignment requirements.

He is just so great! He is super entertaining and I really miss his lectures. I basically know all the stuff in advance, but even if you care just the least about politics it really shouldn't be too hard to do well. Amazing!
ANDY KICKS ASS
Looks like trotsky

Not the best prof,does not have clear instructions and does not communicate with his TA's. For final assignment the TA gave us a different deadline than him. His deadline on canvas was different and the one he said in person was different, but at the day it was due he switched the canvas date and apologized but still made us hand in at the same day
Logan is great for an introductory class. I have changed my major because of him.
Excellent instructor who cared about the welfare of his students.
Excellent and wonders. take his class
Logan was wonderful in teaching this course. He answered all questions and grading was on point.
Awesome prof.
This instructor is great. It was an intro. class so he provided simple concepts and themes. Tutorials were good and I learnt alot about the topic.
Class was great. Letcures were to the point.
Great class, he always adds humor to his lecture.  Would recommend.

Dr. Léger is an amazing prof who is young and inspirational. Very interesting perspective on minority rights in Canada. His lectures are insightful and his assignments are very fair and straightforward. Always available for extra help during office hours and seems like a very kind person who is genuinely interested in his students' success! A+

SAM IS ONE OF THE BEST PROFF'S I HAVE EVER HAD. HE SURE KNOWS HIS STUFF! HE ALSO HAS AN EXCELLENT ABILITY IN RELYING THE MATERIAL SO THAT STUDENTS CAN GAIN A CLEAR UNDERSTANDING OF PERTINENT TOPICS IN THE COURSE. PAPER TOPICS ARE HARD. HIS TA'S ALSO MARK HARD. IF YOU NEED EXTRA HELP, IT'S AVAILABLE.

his lecture slides are not detailed which is hard to follow (is mostly lecture based) but overall a very nice and laid back guy. Has clear expectations and guidelines for assignments and tests,  easy class if you follow his instructions and study from lecture/vocab notes for exams
